value.name: Forgotten History Cedar Rapids: Dexter David Donovan
value.description: I came across an image of Donovan on a Facebook page called 'The Forgotten Iowa Historical Society', which I highly recommend checking out. There I saw the picture included in this post of a fugly puppet and the info about his timeslot.
